subject: Steroids
Horses
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Kentucky Gov. Steve Beshear signed an emergency regulation banning steroids for the state’s thoroughbred and standardbred races. The rules went into effect immediately and banned anabolic steroids from being present in the blood of any horse that is racing. Horse regulators approved the sweeping ban earlier this month.
